summary:
Over 20 years finance experience in manufacturing encompassing medical device and diagnostics coupled with a strong educational background.  Proven track record in financial management for significant growth projects.  As qualified Six Sigma Black Belt I have worked on projects both within operations and commercial finance making significant improvements on the forecasting process.  

   Strong financial and business acumen and very effective at bringing the numbers to life at all levels in the organization.  Performance and results driven and capable of identifying need for change and executing accordingly.

  I am passionate about people development and I lead the Abbott Ireland (8 sites) finance talent management review and I also established the Women Leaders in Abbott (WLA) in Abbott Ireland and participate in the WLA EMEA committee.

currentPositions.description:
I am responsible for the Expansion Program Financial Capital in ADC specifically the new green field site in Kilkenny and the further expansion in Donegal, Ireland and Witney, UK.  I also have responsibility for the finance function in Kilkenny, establishing the finance team, standard cost setting with a cost glide path over the long range plan, relevant systems and processes and our finance lean journey. I am a member of the ADC Expansion Steering Committee.  

At Divisional level I have taken on responsibility for the GMI (Gross Margin Initiative) program leveraging savings across the business in Operation, Procurement and Commercial.  I report directly to the Divisional Controller in this role. 

In Commercial, I led a Black Belt DMADV project on integration of demand planning and financial forecasting.  We developed an integrated process with agreed assumptions that feeds the commercial demand review (CDR) into the rLBE process with one set of numbers.  I received a DVP Award 2023 for this project.
currentPositions.title: Director of Strategic Initiatives and Gross Margin Abbott Diabetes Care

educations.degree: Fellow of the Institute of Chartered Accountants
Certificate in Business Studies with Distinction
Six Sigma Quality Black Belt – Cert L8

headline: Over 20 years finance experience in medical device and diagnostics coupled with a strong educational background.

message.text: Eimear thank you for your kind words. What a great week!!! Whether you are a new hire in Abbott or have a 20+ year Abbott career (like me) there was lots for everyone this Global Development Week; career panel discussions, business insights and details on educational opportunities available. Come join Abbott and grow your career with us! #abbottproud, #womeninleadership #kilkenny

This week was Global Development Week all across Abbott. Some wonderful sessions which offered new knowledge and perspectives.  A thought provoking session with Lorraine Hennessy on "Your Contribution to Gross Margin Improvement".  Some wonderful insights on the world of innovation from Diarmuid Meagher PhD in "R&D Serving the Customer through Innovation".

As WLA (Women Leaders of Abbott) site lead I hosted a watch party for a virtual Development Panel Discussions led by Ciarán Dyar with panellists Stephen Dunne Sarah Adams and Daniele Cordaro.  Some great tips offered around development.  

I'm grateful to work for a company where I can be inspired to learn and grow.
If you are looking for your next career opportunity you may just find it at Abbott!

#abbottproud #womenleadersofabbott #connectinspiregrow

Pauline Hanley Maureen Slattery Seán Corkery Will Slattery Paul Walsh Liam O'Donnell Eimear Morrissey Shane Fogarty Annabelle Normile Manon Wayere Gavril Popescu Alan Martin Carol Burke

Come join our growing finance team in Kilkenny! An exciting opportunity to be part of this high performance team as we implement SAP, establish lean finance processes and provide you with the opportunity to grow your leadership competencies in this dynamic and rewarding environment! #abbottproud

ingestedContentSummary.description: JOB DESCRIPTION: Why will you enjoy this new opportunity? Our new manufacturing facility in Kilkenny, opening in 2024 reflects the growing demand for Abbott's global Diabetes Care products. If you would like to make an impact, there is no better time...
ingestedContentSummary.fullText: JOB DESCRIPTION: Why will you enjoy this new opportunity? Our new manufacturing facility in Kilkenny, opening in 2024 reflects the growing demand for Abbott's global Diabetes Care products. If you would like to make an impact, there is no better time to join than now! At Abbott, you will play a crucial role to help people live more fully at all stages of their lives. Our 113,000 colleagues have a daily impact on the life of people in more than 160 countries. This is an ideal opportunity for you to develop your career as you help shape the future of healthcare. What type of work will you be doing? What assignments, requirements, or skills will you be performing on a regular basis? You must be an ambitious, analytically minded finance professional! You will present to Site Leadership and Divisional Finance Leaders with monthly, quarterly, annual (and ad hoc) financial reports and analysis. You will also assist in the development of on-going and new financial management initiatives. This role will give you the opportunity to develop a team of FP&A Accountants. Responsibilities: Mentor and develop a growing team (This role will develop a team of 4) Month end close and group reporting Lead the development of annual budgets Assist in the development of on-going and new financial management initiatives Create, compile and communicate key findings to Senior Leadership Qualifications/experience: ACA, ACCA or CIMA qualified 5+ years post qualification experience Previous people management experience What is the leadership like for this role? This role reports to Paul Mullally, Plant Controller. This role joins a finance team of 8. Pauls leadership style is focused on inclusiveness, empathy and collaboration. What are the benefits and perks of working at Abbott Kilkenny? Health Insurance for you and your family Pension Life insurance Short Term Disability Protection Long Term Disability Protection Flexible working Carers leave Education Assistance Connect with us at www.abbott.com or https://www.ie.abbott/, on LinkedIn at www.linkedin.com/company/abbott-/, on Facebook at www.facebook.com/Abbott and on Twitter @AbbottNews. Abbott is an equal opportunities employer The base pay for this position is N/A In specific locations, the pay range may vary from the range posted. JOB FAMILY: Accounting & Reporting DIVISION: ADC Diabetes Care LOCATION: Ireland > Kilkenny : Kilkenny Business and Technology Park ADDITIONAL LOCATIONS: WORK SHIFT: Ie - Shftpre0 (Ireland) TRAVEL: Yes, 5 % of the Time MEDICAL SURVEILLANCE: Not Applicable SIGNIFICANT WORK ACTIVITIES: Continuous sitting for prolonged periods (more than 2 consecutive hours in an 8 hour day) Abbott is about the power of health. For more than 125 years, Abbott has been helping people reach their potential — because better health allows people and communities to achieve more. With a diverse, global network serving customers in more than 160 countries, we create new solutions — across the spectrum of health, around the world, for all stages of life. Whether it’s next-generation diagnostics, life-changing devices, science-based nutrition, or novel reformulations, we are advancing some of the most innovative and revolutionary technologies in healthcare, helping people live their best lives through better health. The people of Abbott come to work each day with relentless energy, enthusiasm and a promise to enhance the health and well-being of millions of people. They push the boundaries to help manage and treat some of life’s greatest health challenges. We invite you to explore opportunities at Abbott, to see if your talents and career aspirations may fit with our openings. An equal opportunity employer, Abbott welcomes and encourages diversity in our workforce. Follow Us: Facebook LinkedIn YouTube Twitter
ingestedContentSummary.title: Financial Planning and Reporting Lead

message.text:
Paul Mullally is looking to expand his team and add a Financial Planning and Reporting Lead.

Are you interested in joining our start up project at this exciting time?  I look forward to hearing from you. 

Antonia McGrath, ACA Marian English ACA Padraig Bergin Ursula Russell ACMA, CGMA Lorraine Hennessy 


https://lnkd.in/eB3we2qE

commentary.text: Congrats Dáire! Well done, this is an excellent role for you!! Looking forward to seeing you develop the BI footprint in Abbott Kilkenny!
Welcome to ADC!!! You will have a fantastic experience and learning in Witney, the very best of luck!
